thread.title: Steve Spurrier takes aim at refs: What South Carolina media are saying
thread.title_full: Steve Spurrier takes aim at refs: What South Carolina media are saying | NOLA.com

author: Jim Kleinpeter, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Steve Spurrier takes aim at refs: What South Carolina media are saying
text:
South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier has never been one to hold his tongue. That includes referees, which have lately incurred his wrath, according to Josh Kendall of The State in this story.
Kendall also says Spurrier wants more running out of the running backs .
And here's a breakdown of LSU from the other sideline.
Weather forced the South Carolina coaches out of Williams-Bryce Stadium on Sunday, says Willie Smith of the Greenville News.
Charleston Post & Courier's David Caraviello says the hardest part is yet to come for the Gamecocks.
